bibl.title: Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano.]

BONACASA Nicola, Maria CASINI e Ahmed ETMAN (a cura di), Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano.]
